705359f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lafayette Avenue - Washington Avenue
705359f-a.text:
Lafayette Avenue, north side, east from Washington
Avenue. The corner building is an old Friends Meeting
House as shown on Atlases from 1880. The low building
on its right is a Baptist Sunday school and next to it
is the Emanuel Baptist Church, at the N.W. corner of St.
James Place. At the N.E. corner is the St. dames Protes-
tant Episcopel Church (triangular front).
P. L. Sperr  View 1: July 22, 1934
NO REpRODUCTIONS  View 2: October 12, 1940
705359f-a.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Washington Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

707283f-a.title: Brooklyn: Washington Ave. - Lafayette Ave.
707283f-a.text:
Washington Ave., east side, north from Lafayette AVe., showing a view
of the Orthodox Friend's Society Church.
August 2, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
NW2g ~ 27S
707283f-a.folder: Washington Ave. & Lafayette Ave., Brooklyn, NY
